title: Multitouch does not work, only one touch is recognized
content:
Hello everyone!

On my pixel 4a, after flashing from custom firmware to the official one, multitouch stopped working.
I tried:
Follow THESE instructions
Factory reset
Flashing to factory firmware
Flashing back to custom firmware
Reboot to Safe Mode
Downgrade to android 10 (Multitouch works only on this version of android, but the touch screen has become strange to perceive touches in the center of the screen, as if I press very often instead of drawing a line)
Update to android 11 (Multitouch stopped working again, the touchscreen became normal)
Flash official firmware with bootloader lock

All of the above did not help.
I do not know what else can be done, so I ask for help from you. If I can provide any additional data, then I am ready to provide them.

Thanks in advance!
--Leonid
